ped its mighty wings

hile at the Chivtron base Zero steps into a CR chamber to have

e on him repaired.

  Still elsewhere, at the abnormally massive second inf=
ecticon base,

e where he

re

 =

n into the earth. Still back inside the room begins to pulsate,

htmare would be able to feel her body beggining to heat up as

itan energy built up all within it. If she did not decide

oon the room would be so full of it it would kill her.

swer now. Or else you die."

stantly

ginally, this massive weapon bears upon

rful blast of gamma rays.  The Emperor reverted back to

  >=
 missile launcher in his single hand, his energy resources

rained

was Unitron, in his tank mode, not

ull speed, he was able to dodge both missiles

  > ext=
ensive armor plates that protected his treads, and a fusion

=

  t=
reads.

t pain.

m his large

  alternate 
  > mode.  The mounted machine gun on his =
turret swivelled and fired

who had shot at him.

 existance easily

 his name being Sixshot.  He 
  armed a pair 
  > of missiles, launching th=
em both, each splitting apart, one heading 
  for 
  > Cledar and the other=

ldest among 
  the 
  > current Decepticons present at the battle.  His sca=
nners detected 
  someone 
  > getting a lock on him and two incoming objec=
ts, so he barrel 
  rolled, each 
  > missile going by but the explosions f=
rom the shock wave rattled him 
  a little, 
  > a piece of shrapnel smashi=
ng a small hole through his cockpit and 
  stabbing 
  > into the empty sea=
t.
  >

l 
  and 
  > launching off twenty rapid laser bolts down at Hot Rod.
